name: Yannick Zakowski
content: Home Inria researcher ("chargÃ© de recherche") Cambium research group Inria Paris 48 rue Barrault 75013 Paris Email: yannick.zakowski@inria.fr Curriculum Vitae News /!\ Since 2025 April 1st, I have moved to Inria Paris, as part of the Cambium research group /!\ Drafts and Papers New draft: Tail Modulo Async-Await Joint work with Emma Nardino, Ludovic Henrio, and Gabriel Radanne Accepted at JFP: Choice Trees: Representing and Reasoning About Nondeterministic, Recursive, and Impure Programs in Rocq Joint work with Nicolas Chappe, Paul He, Ludovic Henrio, Eleftherios Ioannidis, and Steve Zdancewic Services I will serve in the Programming Committee for PLDI 2026 I will serve as co-organizer for the JFLA 2026 and 2027 I will serve as conference chair for CPP 2026 and 2027 I will serve as Artifact Evaluation Chair for ECOOP 2025 and 2026 I will serve as web-chair for POPL 2025 and 2026 Students I have the great pleasure to work with brilliant PhD students!
